description: Adds a word to a custom voice model.

parameters.name: customization_id
parameters.description: GUID of the custom voice model to which to which to add a word. You must make the request with service credentials created for the instance of the service that owns the custom model.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to be added to the custom voice model.

parameters.name: translation
parameters.description: Phonetic or sounds-like translation for the word. A phonetic translation is based on the SSML format for representing the phonetic string of a word either as an IPA translation or as an IBM SPR translation. A sounds-like is one or more words that, when combined, sound like the word.

parameters.name: part_of_speech
parameters.description: **Japanese only.** The part of speech for the word. The service uses the value to produce the correct intonation for the word. You can create only a single entry, with or without a single part of speech, for any word; you cannot create multiple entries with different parts of speech for the same word. For more information, see [Working with Japanese entries](https://console.bluemix.net/docs/services/text-to-speech/custom-using.html#jaNotes).
